sections.heading: grants; director; powers.The director may obligate and administer federal grants for construction of safe drinking water projects pursuant to the Safe Drinking Water Act

sections.text:
71-5317.Federal grants; director; powers.

The director may obligate and administer federal grants for construction of safe drinking water projects pursuant to the Safe Drinking Water Act.

SourceLaws 1997, LB 517, ยง 6.
